explanation: [0-0] A man in a black vest is sitting in front of a laptop, adjusting his earphones with his right hand on his ear. On the left side is a TikTok logo with the white subtitles "@mercuri 88" below it. Below that is a yellow rectangle with the black text "Mercuri 88 Official Channel" inside.

[0-4] The man in black extends his left index finger forward, and the scene switches to a man in a red hoodie. He is facing a microphone and blowing up a green balloon with his eyes wide open. He puts down the balloon and speaks into the microphone. Then the man in black shows a helpless expression, while the man in red takes the balloon out of his mouth and speaks into the microphone with his mouth wide open. The icon and subtitles on the left move to the lower right corner.
